citethispage-desc: Adde un pagina special de [[Special:CiteThisPage|citation]] e un ligamine verso le instrumentario
tooltip-citethispage: Information sur como citar iste pagina
citethispage-badrevision: Error: le version del pagina "$1" con ID "$2" non ha essite trovate.
citethispage-content:
__TOC__
== Detalios bibliographic sur {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Nomine del pagina: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Autor: {{SITENAME}} contributors * Editor: ''{{SITENAME}}''. * Data del ultime version: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Data de recuperation: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Adresse URL permanente: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID del version del pagina: {{REVISIONID}}
== Stilos de citation pro {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/APA_style Stilo APA] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}''. Recuperate le {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} a {{CURRENTTIME}} ab {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MLA_Handbook#MLA_Style_Manual Stilo MLA] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}}. === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MHRA_Style_Guide Stilo MHRA] === Contributores a {{SITENAME}}, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}},'' le {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [consultate le {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Chicago_Manual_of_Style Stilo Chicago] === Contributores a {{SITENAME}}, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (consultate le {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Council_of_Science_Editors Stilo CBE/CSE] === Contributores a {{SITENAME}}. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [citate {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Disponibile a: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bluebook Stilo Bluebook] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (visitate ultimemente le le {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Entrata [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BibTeX BibTeX] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[In linea; consultate le {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Quando se usa le pacchetto [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LaTeX LaTeX] "url" (\usepackage{url} in qualque parte del preambulo), lo que resulta generalmente in adresses web con formato multo plus agradabile, lo sequente pote esser preferite: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[In linea; consultate le {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
